metadata.title: CVE-2019-10154 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Moodle before versions 3.7, 3.6.4. A web servicefetching messages was not restricted to the current user's conversations.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
